name: AI Content Generator For Elementor – OpenAI ChatGPT
author: Cool Plugins

sections.description:
Elevate the quality of your Elementor pages content by rewriting the existing content with the assistance of OpenAI ChatGPT technology and improve its readability and engagement.

An Ultimate AI auto content generator for Elementor is an essential plugin for website owners, content creators, and digital marketers who want to save time and effort while creating high-quality content directly inside the Elementor created pages.

There are several use cases, including below mentioned:

  • Rewrite already added content .
  • Generate ideas on based already added content.
  • Write an article based on selected content.
  • Generate a TL;DR
  • Summarize.
  • Generate title & subtitle.

It is an Elementor Website Builder Addon. In order to use this elementor addon you must have to install Elementor Website Builder.

In order to use plugin,Please first follow these steps:-

  1. Create an account at OpenAI.
  2. Create an API key and insert in the plugin settings.
  3. Then you can find AI Auto Content Generator Settings inside Elementor default Text editor.

Open AI Terms of Service & Privacy Policy.

Our plugin use Paid API provided by:- OpenAI.
Here you can view API pricing:-OpenAI Pricing
Please also review OpenAI Privacy Policy and Terms of Service for further information.

Credits:- Our settings panel is powered by the Codestar framework, bringing you a reliable and user-friendly solution for customization.
Please also review Codestar Terms of Service for further information.
sections.faq:
Do you provide plugin free support?

Yes, we are here to provide you with top-notch support. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you with any questions or issues you may encounter.our team is available hours of 9:30 AM to 6:30 PM IST.
